full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I BSKYED RIM GYI RNAM BSHAD PADMA'I ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042A *, ,(CES PADMA YANG GSANG KHROS PA' BSKYED PA'I RIM PA PADMA ZHING GI SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI RDO RJE'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN SOGS NANG SLO 'GA' ZHIG GIS, ,'DI LTA BU ZHIG NGES PAR DGOS ZHES YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, KHYAD BDAG RDO RJE SLOB DPON RNAMS LA CHOS 'DI LA CHOS 'DI'I DBANG BZHI YONGS RDZOGS BKA' SDOD KYI RIGS GTAD DANG, RTA BO YONGS RDZOGS PA'I LUNG MAN NGAG THOB CING, BSNYEN BSGRUB SOGS TSAD DU 'KHYOL ZHING, CHOS 'DI LA DAL BA MANG DU BYAS PA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN NAM, ,'DI NYID KYI DKYIL 'KHOR DU PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYI MING THOS PAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID DO, ,'DIS KYANG GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
